properties.description: Deploys a default Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) deployment with all dependencies.

resourcePrefix.description: The prefix, utilized by this Blueprint, that is used in naming of those objects. This value should be kept as short as possible

scriptURI.description: The URL to the script folder available during Blueprint assignment.

avdHostPool_vmSize.description: The Azure VM size of the session hosts being created by this Blueprint. To select a different size, find the VM size and change the value of this parameter to match

avdHostPool_vmNumberOfInstances.description: The number of Azure AVD VMs to be created

avdHostPool_maxSessionLimit.description: The number of users allowed per session host in the AVD host pool to be created

avdUsers_userCount.description: The number of AVD test users to be created

vnetEnableDdosProtection.description: Whether or not the Azure DDoS plan will be created by this Blueprint

ADDS_domainName.description: The domain name of your AAD DS managed domain to be created

AzureEnvironmentName.description: Which cloud this Blueprint will be deployed in.

AzureStorageFQDN.description: Fully qualified domain name of the Azure Files storage share. Default is Azure Commercial, alternate choice is AzGov

ADDS_emailNotifications.description: Optional and not implemented at this time

script_executionUserResourceID.description: ARM path to the managed identity by name. The name at the end of the string is the name used when creating the managed identity and is arbitrary.

scriptExecutionUserObjectID.description: The object ID of the Azure global administrator account used to initiate the Blueprint assignment

keyvault_ownerUserObjectID.description: The Object ID of the managed identity
